projects.title: Cocktail-O-Clock
projects.desc: Cocktail-O-Clock is an dynamic interactive front-end application that seeks to inform the user about the cocktail of their choice, whilst adding a fun, entertaining element in the form of GIF.

projects.title: JavaScript Portfolio
projects.desc: This repository demonstrate a portfolio layout using JavaScript, HTML, advance CSS and Bootstrap from scratch.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.desc: A weather dashboard application with search functionality to find current weather conditions and the future weather outlook for multiple cities.

projects.title: Team Profile Generator
projects.desc: An Object-Oriented Programming application using Node command line that dynamically generates the team member profile HTML webpage, that displays summaries for each person from the user's input.
